casebody.data:
John SCOLES, as Trustee FOR the SOUTHERN DIVISION PEMBINA NATION TRUST, LT., Appellant,
v.
DEUTSCHE BANK NATIONAL TRUST COMPANY, ON BEHALF OF FINANCIAL ASSET SECURITIES CORP., Soundview Home Loan Trust 2007-WMC1, Asset-Backed Certificates, Series 2007-WMC1, Appellee. Case No. 2D17-475 District Court of Appeal of Florida, Second District. Opinion filed January 24, 2018

DECISION WITHOUT PUBLISHED OPINION

Affirmed.
